meanings.sent1: The plain, characterless walls of the room made it feel dull.
meanings.sent2: The characterless design of the building blended in with the others on the street.
meanings.sent3: Her characterless outfit was so boring, it made her friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The characterless landscape stretched out endlessly, devoid of any interesting landmarks.
meanings.sent5: The characterless book had no exciting plot twists or memorable characters.

meanings.sent1: The characterless politician was known for his dishonesty.
meanings.sent2: She was wary of the characterless salesman who seemed too eager to make a deal.
meanings.sent3: The characterless behavior of the students shocked the teacher.
meanings.sent4: His characterless actions spoke volumes about his lack of integrity.
meanings.sent5: The characterless decision to cheat on the test left a stain on his reputation.
